plot: In order to convince her father that her boyfriend is a rough, tough Westerner, Errol's daughter gets him involved in a stagecoach robbery and a saloon shootout, but a staged holdup proves to be the real thing.
title: The Cactus Cut-Up
plot_es: In order to convince her father that her boyfriend is a rough, tough Westerner, Errol's daughter gets him involved in a stagecoach robbery and a saloon shootout, but a staged holdup proves to be the real thing.
plot_en: In order to convince her father that her boyfriend is a rough, tough Westerner, Errol's daughter gets him involved in a stagecoach robbery and a saloon shootout, but a staged holdup proves to be the real thing.
